name: .LMK File Extension
summary: Learn about .LMK files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Logo image created by Sothink Logo Maker design software; often created from a template included with the software but can also be designed from scratch using the various shapes, patterns, and graphics included with the software.

content: Logo Maker images can be exported to the .SVG, .PNG, and .JPG formats.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
